content: in this pattern i will guide you through how to make a hair scrunchie with any dk/fingering/lace weight leftover yarn that you might have the pattern shows you how to do a colourwork scrunchie but you could easily just make it in one colour too i am always on a mission to try to use up all my leftovers so this was definitely the inspiration for this project materials for this one i used sierra andina by adrifail ca 9-10g 24-27m and 7-8g/19-22m of the cc i used 4mm circular needles but you can just use the needles that match your yarn you will need a hair elastic grab your leftovers and make a beautiful scrunchie
